description: Looks at the Menzies LCP government's attempt to ban the Communist Party in Australia in the referendum of 1951 through the dramatic portrayal of the life of a young couple who are members of the party. Highlights the near hysterical atmosphere of this period in Australia's history. Cast includes Martin Vaughn, Barry Otto and John Howard.
